nodes.text: Star Wars: The Original Trilogy – A Graphic Novel

Star Wars: The Original Trilogy – A Graphic Novel is a graphic novel adapting the events of the Star Wars original trilogy. It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on March 1, 2016. The hardcover volume comprises 208 pages and is intended for children ages 8–12. It serves as a companion piece to the subsequent Star Wars: The Prequel Trilogy – A Graphic Novel. IDW Publishing later re-released the graphic novel in three distinct editions based on each original trilogy film as Star Wars: A New Hope Graphic Novel Adaptation, Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back Graphic Novel Adaptation and Star Wars: Return of the Jedi Graphic Novel Adaptation.

Everyone's favorite tale of good versus evil takes on a whole new look in this graphic novel! Join Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Princess Leia, Darth Vader, and the rest of the heroes and villains from a galaxy far, far away in this graphic novel collection that retells the original three Star Wars films: A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back, and Return of the Jedi. You'll experience the saga in a way you never have before!
